# The `NVPTXAliasAnalysis.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptx">NVPTX</a> address space based alias analysis pass. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This is the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptx">NVPTX</a> address space based alias analysis pass.

<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the first non-generic address space traversing the UD chain.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is undefined behaviour if a pointer belongs to more than one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-overlapping address spaces along a valid execution path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GetAS = &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V) -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PointerType&gt;</a>(V-&gt;getType()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PTy-&gt;getAddressSpace();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dca6c5cbbdf5d30037891306aa6f4924861">ADDRESS&#95;SPACE&#95;GENERIC</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxLookup-- &amp;&amp; GetAS(V) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dca6c5cbbdf5d30037891306aa6f4924861">ADDRESS&#95;SPACE&#95;GENERIC</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;NewV = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3b1c5788b85ffa254be0e834edf5cf8f">getUnderlyingObject</a>(V, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NewV == V)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">    V = NewV;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GetAS(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="#aa108193c2ff5ea46a3ada182dd7867e7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult/#a8d3de277fb70fa515efac2db2cfe9d57">AliasResult::Kind</a> <a href="#aa108193c2ff5ea46a3ada182dd7867e7">getAliasResult</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AS1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AS2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((AS1 == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dca6c5cbbdf5d30037891306aa6f4924861">ADDRESS&#95;SPACE&#95;GENERIC</a>) || (AS2 == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptxas/#ad7d00b71af84502be65ae2de3f8d91dca6c5cbbdf5d30037891306aa6f4924861">ADDRESS&#95;SPACE&#95;GENERIC</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult/#a8d3de277fb70fa515efac2db2cfe9d57a0916b614598c673c1e6a59c7312a1409">AliasResult::MayAlias</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PTX s6.4.1.1. Generic Addressing:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A generic address maps to global memory unless it falls within</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the window for const, local, or shared memory. The Kernel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Function Parameters (.param) window is contained within the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .global window.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Therefore a global pointer may alias with a param pointer on some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GPUs via addrspacecast(param-&gt;generic-&gt;global) when cvta.param</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction is used (PTX 7.7+ and SM&#95;70+).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: cvta.param is not yet supported. We need to change aliasing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rules once it is added.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AS1 == AS2 ? <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult/#a8d3de277fb70fa515efac2db2cfe9d57a0916b614598c673c1e6a59c7312a1409">AliasResult::MayAlias</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult/#a8d3de277fb70fa515efac2db2cfe9d57a863ee317b92588eb2d6878af9fc98922">AliasResult::NoAlias</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxaaresult/#a3c6e127da93ba9d67d0f1d42a0e9827b"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aliasresult">AliasResult</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxaaresult/#a3c6e127da93ba9d67d0f1d42a0e9827b">NVPTXAAResult::alias</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> &amp;Loc1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation">MemoryLocation</a> &amp;Loc2, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaqueryinfo">AAQueryInfo</a> &amp;AAQI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AS1 = <a href="#af6ab6e89a7e272521d7641859805a0ba">getAddressSpace</a>(Loc1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a9550ce4a179e46db37f653ce28feca7a">Ptr</a>, <a href="#a0b2bb68cc2336782f7cf85bec893b2c8">TraverseAddressSpacesLimit</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AS2 = <a href="#af6ab6e89a7e272521d7641859805a0ba">getAddressSpace</a>(Loc2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a9550ce4a179e46db37f653ce28feca7a">Ptr</a>, <a href="#a0b2bb68cc2336782f7cf85bec893b2c8">TraverseAddressSpacesLimit</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aa108193c2ff5ea46a3ada182dd7867e7">getAliasResult</a>(AS1, AS2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: .param address space may be writable in presence of cvta.param, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this instruction is currently not supported. NVPTXLowerArgs also does not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allow any writes to .param pointers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105" lineLink="#ada8150e3a71552f9e815108aba570643"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ada8150e3a71552f9e815108aba570643">isConstOrParam</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AS == AddressSpace::ADDRESS&#95;SPACE&#95;CONST ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">         AS == AddressSpace::ADDRESS&#95;SPACE&#95;PARAM;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
